byline.contributor: Charles V. Bagli and Campbell Robertson contributed reporting.

abstract: Defense team that got Robert Durst acquitted of murder Galveston, Tex, in 2003 faces much greater challenge in fighting his latest murder charge in 2000 death of his friend Susan Berman; Durst has become much more famous in intervening years, largely due to HBO documentary about him, and trial will be held in Los Angeles, where many celebrity trials have been sensationalized by media
lead_paragraph: The prosecution and the defense should expect challenges, as happened in other Los Angeles legal proceedings involving high-profile defendants, like O. J. Simpson and Michael Jackson.

headline.main: This Time, Robert Durst Faces a Murder Charge in the Capital of Celebrity Trials
headline.print_headline: This Time, Durst Faces a Murder Charge in the Capital of Celebrity Trials

snippet: The prosecution and the defense should expect challenges, as happened in other Los Angeles legal proceedings involving high-profile defendants, like O. J. Simpson and Michael Jackson.

keywords.value: The Jinx: The Life and Deaths of Robert Durst (TV Program)
keywords.name: creative_works
